## GAD-7 vs CAMEEI

The task of harmonising and comparing different questionnaires can be a daunting task for researchers. This is especially true when looking into similar instruments such as the Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the Cambridge Early Experiences Interview (CAMEEI). However, due to advances in AI technology, this otherwise tedious process can be significantly streamlined by employing software like Harmony. Comparatively evaluating the items between GAD-7 and CAMEEI has never been easier with Harmony. A remarkable tool in the hands of psychologist and researchers, Harmony superbly utilises large language models to compare these instruments and can provide detailed comparisons. More than just eliminating manual labor, it cements precision into the process by quantifying the percentage match between each item in GAD-7 and CAMEEI. GAD-7 vs CAMEEI doesn't have to be a painstakingly slow process - Harmony can quickly and accurately do that for you. GAD-7 vs CAMEEI comparative evaluation is not only conducive for research but a necessity in the ever-growing lexical changes in questionnaires. Harmony doesn't limit itself to one language. It can compare items in multiple languages, further broadening the horizon of cross-study and cohort analysis. In the ever-changing landscape of research studies, it’s tools like Harmony that facilitate better comparability and understanding across different research instruments like GAD-7 vs CAMEEI. Don’t let the tedium of manual questionnaire harmonisation slow down your research, let Harmony streamline your GAD-7 vs CAMEEI comparative evaluations and set a new standard for your research process.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and CAMEEI

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and CAMEEI into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just CAMEEI into Harmony</a> - compare CAMEEI with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
